query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'claims') as claims_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'evidence_sources') as evidence_sources_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'evidence_documents') as evidence_documents_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'evidence_excerpts') as evidence_excerpts_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'evidence_datasets') as evidence_datasets_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'evidence_observations') as evidence_observations_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'conflicts') as conflicts_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'entities') as entities_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'regulations') as regulations_exists;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4DB9hJWqLzCzJpD.4ae2ba9639dc --database XodoyKMzPdFiKkVj3QFTGK --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'claims') as claims_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'evidence_sources') as evidence_sources_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'evidence_documents') as evidence_documents_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'evidence_excerpts') as evidence_excerpts_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'evidence_datasets') as evidence_datasets_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'evidence_observations') as evidence_observations_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'conflicts') as conflicts_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'entities') as entities_exists,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'regulations') as regulations_exists;
